title: Bit toggle operation in DWORD
name: LGF_BitToggle
description: This block toggles (from TRUE to FALSE and vice versa) a bit at a predefined position in a variable of the data type DWORD.

input.name: value
input.description: Tag where the bit has to be toggled

input.name: bitNo
input.description: Bit number to be toggled in the “value” parameter.
